DOC.brief_summary: To determine if Fluorescein systemic injection during hysterectomy procedure can be useful in revealing the depth of endometrial cancer invasion.
DOC.brief_title: A Pilot Study to Determine the Efficacy of Fluorescein Visualization of the Uterus in Detecting Endometrial Cancer Invasion
DOC.criteria: Documented endometrial cancer and scheduled for hysterectomy as part of their treatment. No known allergy to fluorescein dye Ability to understand and sign informed consent 18 years of age or older Prior hysterectomy Known sensitivity to fluorescein dye
